mapper.update:
update wxuser
openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
headimgurl = #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pea = #{pea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unionid = #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
integral = #{integral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
retailmoney = #{retailmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
issign = #{issign,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isretail = #{isretail,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
where token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wxuser set openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headimgurl = #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pea = #{pea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unionid = #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, retailmoney = #{retailmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, issign = #{issign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isretail = #{isretail,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE} where token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
